cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SlimeTote.Name: Slime Totem
cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SlimeTote.Description: Warps you to a slime-infested area in the mines.

cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BugTotem.Name: Bug Totem
cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BugTotem.Description: Warps you to a bug-infested area in the mines.

cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SkeletonT.Name: Skeleton Totem
cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SkeletonT.Description: Warps you to a skeleton-infested area in the mines.

cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BatTotem.Name: Bat Totem
cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BatTotem.Description: Warps you to a bat-infested area in the mines.

Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SlimeTote: Dear @,^I've noticed you've been getting quite good at handling those slimes in the mines. I think you're ready to learn something special.^Here's a recipe for a Slime Totem that can help you find more of them when you need to.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SlimeTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BugTotemR: Dear @,^Your skill at exterminating those pesky cave insects hasn't gone unnoticed. I've got something that might interest you.^This recipe for a Bug Totem will help you find more when you need them.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BugTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SkeletonT: Dear @,^I've been watching your progress with those skeletons in the mines. Impressive work.^Here's a recipe for a Skeleton Totem - use it wisely.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_SkeletonTotem %%
Entries.cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BatTotemR: Dear @,^Your prowess at dealing with those cave bats is remarkable. I think you're ready for this.^This Bat Totem recipe should help you find more of them when needed.^    -Marlon%item craftingRecipe cakeymat.InfestedMonsterTotems_BatTotem %%
